pr_title: chore(deps): update http4s packages to v0.21.4

timeline.message: chore(deps): update http4s packages to v0.21.4

Create a blocker by lifting the global execution context.

As Headers is no longer a collection, call 'toList' to explicitly convert
it to a collection.

timeline.bodyText:
Honestly, I am 100% sure if using ExecutionContext.global here is good because the doc for liftExecutionContext says that This must not be used with general purpose contexts like scala.concurrent.ExecutionContext.Implicits.global .
An alternative is Blocker.liftExecutionContext(ExecutionContext.fromExecutorService(Executors.newFixedThreadPool(1)))  .
I guess it's fine to have only one thread.
